DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect genistein administration coronary artery human . We measure size coronary artery speed amount blood flow response subject ingest SuproÂ® drink ( soy protein drink contain genistein ) .
DOC.brief_title: Isoflavones Coronary Circulation Men Women With Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Aged 3075 year Patients require diagnostic coronary angiography Presence coronary artery disease angiogram least one nonobstructed ( lesion < 70 % narrow compare adjacent normal part vessel ) atheromatous vessel ( confirm diagnostic cardiac catheterisation ) Female patient must postmenopausal ( FSH > 40 IU/L ) Willing give informed , write consent Age < 30 > 75 year Allergy radiographic contrast medium Sinoatrial disease significant bradycardia Concomitant medication persantin ( dipyridamole ) theophyllines Asthma Hypertension Left ventricular hypertrophy dysfunction ( clinical/ECG/echo/CXR ) Female patient FSH < 40 IU/L ( postmenopausal ) Female patient currently take hormone therapy , take hormone therapy previous 6 month Unwilling give write informed consent Participation another study within previous 60 day
